mapper.sql: shets.ht_electronic_tag_storage_id, shets.electronic_tag_storage_id, shets.storage_id, shets.equipment_id, shets.electronic_tag_id, shets.`status`, shets.create_user_id, shets.create_time, shets.modified_user_id, shets.modified_time, shets.is_delete, shets.option1, shets.option2, shets.option3
mapper.select:
select , su.user_name AS create_user_name, sus.user_name AS modified_user_name, ss.storage_name AS storage_name, ss.storage_desc AS storage_desc, se.equipment_name AS equipment_name, se.equipment_ip AS equipment_ip, se.equipment_port AS equipment_port, sw.warehouse_name AS warehouse_name, swa.warehouse_area_name AS warehouse_area_name FROM smt_ht_electronic_tag_storage shets LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user su ON shets.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user sus ON shets.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN smt_storage ss ON shets.storage_id = ss.storage_id LEFT JOIN smt_equipment se ON shets.equipment_id = se.equipment_id LEFT JOIN smt_warehouse sw ON ss.warehouse_id = sw.warehouse_id LEFT JOIN smt_warehouse_area swa ON ss.warehouse_area_id = swa.warehouse_area_id
and date_format(shets.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and ss.storage_name like CONCAT('%', #{storageName}, '%')
and sw.warehouse_name like CONCAT('%', #{warehouseName}, '%')
and swa.warehouse_area_name like CONCAT('%', #{warehouseAreaName}, '%')
and se.equipment_name like CONCAT('%', #{equipmentName}, '%')
and se.equipment_ip like CONCAT('%', #{equipmentIp}, '%')
and shets.electronic_tag_id like CONCAT('%', #{electronicTagId}, '%')
and shets.status=#{status}
order by shets.modified_time desc
